attributes.action: Cyclists To Have Compulsory  Lessons Then Tests PayRoad Tax /Insurance
attributes.additional_details:
Cyclists Like Other Road Users  Should have to Take Compulsory Lessons
Then Tests Same As Other Road Users
Pay road tax
Have Full Insurance Cover
And On Spot Fines For Riding On Public Footpaths


Cyclists don't seem to know the rules of the road and as a result end up in accidents with other road users.
